question: Who won men's 5000 metre race in the 57th National Open Athletics Championships?
explanation: Asian champion Govindan Lakshmanan cruised to victory in the men's 5000 metre race on the opening day of the 57th National Open Athletics Championships at the Nehru Stadium. Lakshmanan, fresh from winning a gold in the 3,000m event at the Asian Indoor Games in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan.
